name: OR_CASE_NT_ASC_TXT
description: This table includes the reason the patient is going to an Inpatient OR instead of an ASC.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RSN_CASE_NOT_ASC
columns.description: The reason a case is being done in an Inpatient Operating Room (IP OR) instead of an Ambulatory Surgery Center (ASC).
